Pre-Game Insights: The Canadian men’s national team are preparing for a tough match against France, the second-best team in the world, as part of their Copa América preparations.
This match serves as a crucial test for Canada before facing Argentina in the Copa América.
France features key players like Kylian Mbappé, who recently moved to Real Madrid, and a strong squad with many top-tier European talents.
Canada's coach Jesse Marsch may make tactical adjustments to his lineup, considering the tough opponents and the importance of the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Projected lineups for both teams include several high-profile players from top European leagues.
The match is the second friendly for France in this international window, following a 3-0 win over Luxembourg.
Canada has a historical disadvantage against France, with only one win in past meetings.
